tutorial_arrival_beach.title: First-Step Cove
tutorial_arrival_beach.text: Chalk lines and gentle lanterns mark a sheltered cove carved out for newcomers. Soft surf mutes the hum of distant hubs while practice arches shimmer within view.

choices.text: Follow the chalk-marked path inland.
Test the signal lantern to open the controls overlay.
[Hint] Movement is just choosing a numbered option or pressing Enter.
Disable tutorial hints.
Enable tutorial hints.
Approach the guest-law exit arch.

tutorial_controls_overlay.title: Controls Overlay
tutorial_controls_overlay.text:
Movement: press the number beside a choice or hit Enter for the first option.
Interact: choices marked with tags or resources will note what they spend.
Overlays: I opens inventory, T shows tags and traits, P pauses, and Q quits to desktop.

choices.text: Close the overlay and return to the cove.
Head inland to practice what you learned.
Disable tutorial hints.
Enable tutorial hints.

tutorial_hint_movement.title: Movement Prompt
tutorial_hint_movement.text: Pick numbered options to travel between nodes. The leftmost choice is always 1, and pressing Enter repeats the first option so you can move even without lifting your hand from the keyboard.

choices.text: Got it—return to the cove.
Open the controls overlay for the full list.
Disable tutorial hints.

tutorial_clearing.title: Practice Clearing
tutorial_clearing.text: A braided clearing waits inland, stocked with communal supplies and a patient listening stone. Lanterns pulse encouragement toward the workshop and the arch back to the docks.

choices.text: Collect the scattered memory seeds.
Listen to the responding stone beacon.
Examine the braiding loom under the canopy.
[Hint] Items you pick up appear in your inventory overlay (press I).
Walk the loop back toward the landing cove.
Complete your training and venture into the wider world.

tutorial_hint_resource.title: Inventory Prompt
tutorial_hint_resource.text: Press I anytime to open your inventory overlay and confirm what you have gathered. Resources listed there feed into choices that ask for items, so you can check before committing.

choices.text: Return to the clearing.
Open the controls overlay for more reminders.
Disable tutorial hints.

tutorial_listening_stone.title: Responding Stone
tutorial_listening_stone.text: The stone hums with a gentle chord, lighting sigils whenever you tap it. Each response mirrors how story flags will echo through later hubs.

choices.text: Match the rhythm and feel the response ripple back.
[Hint] Flags you set show up under the FLAGS summary (press T).
Step away from the stone.

tutorial_hint_interact.title: Flag Prompt
tutorial_hint_interact.text: The summary line at the bottom of each screen lists FLAGS you've set so far. Press T to review them in detail and understand how earlier interactions unlocked new choices.

choices.text: Return to the responding stone.
Open the controls overlay.
Disable tutorial hints.

tutorial_workbench.title: Braiding Loom
tutorial_workbench.text: A portable loom waits with diagrams on how to weave gathered seeds into helpful anklets. The pattern promises your first upgrade if you follow it through.

choices.text: Weave the memory seed into a Light-Step anklet.
Test the anklet around the clearing.
[Hint] Upgrades live under Tags/Traits (press T).
Leave the loom.

tutorial_hint_upgrade.title: Upgrade Prompt
tutorial_hint_upgrade.text: Press T to review your Tags and Traits. Newly earned upgrades like Light-Step appear there and unlock extra routes in later hubs.

choices.text: Return to the loom.
Open the controls overlay.
Disable tutorial hints.

tutorial_exit_gate.title: Guest-Law Exit Arch
tutorial_exit_gate.text: A calm arch braided with guest-law sigils waits for travelers who complete the loop. Lanterns confirm your new anklet hum before aligning a path toward the Startways.

choices.text: Step through to the Startways Nexus.
Review the controls overlay before leaving.
Stay on the island for more practice.

sky_docks.title: Sky-Spliced Docks
sky_docks.text: Stormglass piers sway above the mist; signal-kites rattle as Aeol Nests wardens chant the day's winds. Prism Cartel runners hustle cargo while seed-compass couriers flash Startways sigils.

choices.text: (Emissary) Flash envoy seals to the Aeol warden for priority clearance.
(Sneaky) Ride a cargo hoist between patrol sweeps.
Volunteer as a docket runner until your name is called.
(Light-Step) Skip along taut mooring cables to the maintenance lift.
(People-Reader) Mirror the warden's gestures to slide ahead quietly.
Follow a seed-compass courier toward the Startways Nexus.
Accept the Aeol rota posting and settle into the mooring office.
Sign on as the rainchain hostel steward and keep the bunks humming.

root_tangle_market.title: Root Assembly Market
root_tangle_market.text: Living terraces coil around the Assembly tree, thrumming with petitioners and spice-sellers. Songbirds carry living-law updates from branch to branch.

choices.text: (Arbiter) Audit the travel ledgers to secure a formal hearing slot.
(Weaver) Braid stabilizing cords for the speaking dais, impressing the clerks.
'Everyone's so tense... let me understand what's really happening here.' — Compile testimony for the clerks.
Submit your compiled testimony for a guest-law docket.
(People-Reader) Whisper the judge's likely ruling to the crowd, earning a Freehands escort.
(Emissary) Rally Aeol outriders to ferry you toward the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
(Emissary) Broker a prism exchange to ride their courier lane into the galleria.
Spend a root-writ to fast-track your guest-law hearing docket.
Trade a favor for a Freehands glider run toward the Saltglass engines.
(Root Assembly 1+) Call in Assembly trust to open the caretaker lift.
Descend toward the orrery-of-roots caretakers.
File your steward rota and take the first shift yourself.
Close the petitions early and audit the night ledgers yourself.

prism_galleria.title: Prism Cartel Galleria
prism_galleria.text: Mirrored arcades refract the afternoon into ribbons while Cartel stewards trade favors under crystal awnings. Hovering heliostats hum as apprentices tune their beams.

choices.text: (Tinkerer) Resequence a cracked heliostat for Cartel credit.
(Cartographer) Plot the shifting aisles into a precise maintenance route.
Sign a Cartel marker pledging future service for elevator access.
(Light-Step) Balance along the suspension cables to the service lift.
(People-Reader) Read the steward's tells to secure a discreet escort.
(Emissary) Broker a chime-lift lane into the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
(Emissary) Escort Prism proofs directly to the guest-law chamber.
Spend a color baffle to signal the Saltglass engine's prism pier.
Trade a windbone token for a stewarded lift back to the Startways.
(Prism Cartel 1+) Invoke Cartel patronage for a private tram to the grotto.
(Resonant) Harmonize the galleria chimes to open the Cloud-Burrow transfer.
Post your maintenance rota as a public cooperative and oversee the shift.
Convert your private tram clearance into a shared steward shift and stay on.
Trade your pledge for the night lift roster and settle behind the desk.
Publish the prism light commons pact linking lifts to guest-law routes.
Take the maintenance stairs to the upper prism workshops.
Follow the service corridor toward the central hub.

guestlaw_chamber.title: Guest-Law Chamber
guestlaw_chamber.text: Root-braided benches cradle envoys beneath a canopy of verdict sigils. Voices resonate through living wood as the Assembly convenes a pivotal hearing.

choices.text: (Arbiter) Ratify the guest-law compact for all hubs.
Spend a prism shard to flood the dais with undeniable proof.
Defer the hearing to rally Prism Cartel support.
(People-Reader) Expose a hidden clause tying the Court to the Freehands.
(Light-Step) Slip along the balcony to spy on the Prism delegation's exit route.

luminous_grotto.title: Luminous Grotto
luminous_grotto.text: Sunken prisms diffuse twilight into rippling curtains while Freehands skiffs bob in hidden coves. Bioluminescent roots mark half-forgotten escape canals.

choices.text: (Lumenar) Bend the lightwells to reveal a hidden canal and sail free.
(Healer) Tend to the wounded Freehands and earn their pledged skiff.
Cash in a favor to hire a pilot through the gloom.
Stash supplies among the phosphor roots for future runs.
(People-Reader) Sense the Freehands leader's worry and promise a future favor.
Raise your cached supplies into a Freehands regatta and promise to keep it running.
File the common tide charter so Aeol pilots match Freehands relief runs.
Follow the glowing canal deeper into the underground network.
Climb the phosphorescent roots to reach higher caverns.

ending_escape.title: Hidden Canal Flight
ending_escape.text:
You slip a skiff into the phosphor canals before the patrol lights turn.
Cached crates from a dozen favors keep you ahead of every toll-chain.
By dusk, the mist remembers only the wake you chose to leave.

ending_guestlaw.title: Guest-Law Compact
ending_guestlaw.text:
You leave the chamber with the guest-law compact signed in four inks.
Dock masters swap updated ledgers, each hub agreeing to shelter travelers in turn.
No banner claims credit; the precedent simply hums through every root and rail.

ending_correction.title: Orrery Caretaker
ending_correction.text:
You post yourself in the orrery's bronze heart, feeling each pulse through sap-stained gloves.
Season after season you tune the correction, synchronizing tides, caravans, and the breath of resting elders.
Travelers speak of the caretaker, not a name, when they note how the schedule never slips.

root_orrery_concourse.title: Orrery-of-Roots Concourse
root_orrery_concourse.text: Vast living galleries spiral around a bronze-hearted trunk; saplight drips across calculating roots while caretakers whisper seasonal sums.

choices.text: (Weaver) Descend along braided harness to the Loom Gallery.
Take the freight ladder down to the Loom Gallery.
(Archivist) Follow ledger etchings toward the Memory Vault.
Consult the posted indices and head for the Memory Vault.
(Healer) Trace the sap-scented draft into the infirmary roots.
Trail the warm sap breeze toward the infirmary roots.
(Arbiter) Present your docket to the registry tiers.
Request a visitor chit for the registry tiers.
(Weaver+Arbiter) Lace consensus cords to open the caretaker dais.
(Healer+Resonant) Harmonize the pulse conduits before tending the infirmary.
(Archivist+Weaver) Pattern a schema that ushers you toward the lens cradle.
Step onto the caretaker dais at the orrery's heart.
Climb the service roots back to the Root Assembly Market.
Ride the tether back to the Startways Nexus.

root_orrery_registry.title: Root Registry Tiers
root_orrery_registry.text: Brass-sheathed root clerks hum from loam-caked abaci, stamping living writs; one pulses through your palm, 'We feel urgency by soil-scent—steady yourself.'

choices.text: (Root-Writ) Bind a root-writ to unlock the threading chamber.
(Arbiter) Cite precedent to fast-track the correction.
Step back to gather missing components.

root_orrery_looms.title: Bronze Loom Gallery
root_orrery_looms.text: Suspended walkways sway above root-driven gears as bronze filaments sing against living wood.

choices.text: (Weaver) Align the loom-cantilever to draw out a bronze filament.
Offer to cover a loom shift for a bronze filament spool.
Carry the bronze filament toward the correction gearroots.
Ride the lift back to the concourse.

root_orrery_archives.title: Memory Vault Galleries
root_orrery_archives.text: Shelves of resin tablets glow with captured seasons as quiet keepers tend to whispering root-scribes.

choices.text: (Archivist) Sift seasonal ledgers for a root-writ template.
Donate courier notes to earn a copied root-writ.
Descend to the lens cradle where sap memories refract.
Return to the concourse tiers.

root_orrery_lens_cradle.title: Sap Lens Cradle
root_orrery_lens_cradle.text: A suspended basin of luminous sap refracts predictions while bronze arms hold half-formed lenses in gentle tension.

choices.text: (Healer) Sing the sap flows clear, shaping a lens.
(Archivist) Calibrate the recorded seasons for a stable lens.
Promise to report your findings to borrow a sap lens.
Carry the sap lens to the alignment platform.
Return to the memory vaults.

root_orrery_infirmary.title: Sap Infirmary Roots
root_orrery_infirmary.text: Caretakers soothe stressed roots in warm pools while bronze splints hum with quiet corrective tones.

choices.text: (Healer) Massage the root knots, earning the caretakers' trust.
Apply bronze filament braces to stabilize fractures.
Commit to stay the season tending the correction.
Return to the concourse tiers.

root_orrery_dais.title: Caretaker Dais
root_orrery_dais.text: Bronze gimbals rise from the living trunk, their roots thrumming with equations waiting to be sung back into season.

choices.text: (Weaver) Listen for the chord of seasons within the gears.
(Archivist) Inspect the correction logs for missing entries.
(Healer) Warm the sap channels feeding the dais.
(Arbiter) Evaluate the steward disputes over cadence.
Approach the resonance controls.
Claim staging quarters for the Root Depths crews.
Return to the concourse tiers.
Trace the mirrored dunes route toward the Saltglass Expanse.

root_orrery_resonance.title: The Heart of Resonance
root_orrery_resonance.text:
As Root-Speaker intuition guides your hands, the bronze conduits surge with recognition. This isn't just a machine—it's the living nervous system of the entire orrery, and it's been waiting for someone who could speak its ancient language.

'At last,' breathes a voice from the bronze itself, 'a true Root-Speaker returns. The correction ritual has been incomplete for decades. Without proper attunement, the seasonal flows grow more chaotic each year.'

You sense the weight of responsibility settling on your shoulders. Thousands depend on the orrery's precise timing.

choices.text: 'I accept the responsibility. Teach me the full correction ritual.'
'What happens if the correction fails completely?'
'I'm not ready for this burden. Help me understand first.'

root_orrery_threading.title: Gearroot Loom
root_orrery_threading.text: Living gears clack patiently, awaiting the conductive braid that will restart their seasonal song.

choices.text: Seat the bronze filament through the gearroots.
(Weaver) Hum the filament into sync with the roots.
Admit you need a bronze filament and retreat to the loom.

root_orrery_focus.title: Lens Alignment Platform
root_orrery_focus.text: Bronze arms arc overhead, ready to cradle a sap lens that can read the tree-machine's upcoming tides.

choices.text: Set the sap lens into the focusing cradle.
(Healer) Coax clarity from the sap lens before placement.
Realize you still need the sap lens.

root_orrery_tuning.title: Tuning Gallery
root_orrery_tuning.text: Root-crowns and bronze rings spin in cautious counterpoint, waiting for a guiding hand to set their season.

choices.text: (Weaver) Weave the bronze and root pulses into a new cadence.
(Archivist) Record the adjustments and signal the caretakers.
(Healer) Channel restorative sap to smooth the change.
(Arbiter) Affirm the correction in the Assembly ledgers.
(Root-Speaker) Commune directly with the thinking tree.
Hold the correction steady while the caretakers finish.
Step away, leaving the correction incomplete.

root_orrery_mentor.title: Root-Speaker Mentor
root_orrery_mentor.text: A Root-Speaker rests within a hollowed node, listening to sap-currents and translating them into hushed counsel.

choices.text: (Root-Speaker) Echo the mentor's cadence into the sap chorus.
Share a breath with the mentor and match their cadence.
Discuss the correction schedule in greater detail.
Return quietly to the concourse.

startways_nexus.text: A colossal seed-compass suspends over the void, its gimbals swiveling as routes align and distant hubs flare within each arch.

(Tides) Study the Moon-Eel archway as tides lap across its frame.

(Orrery) Descend the sap-lit stairs toward the orrery-of-roots.

(Shadow) Follow the shadow path to the Shadow Marshes.

(Tide) Dive through the tidal portal to the Sanctum.
(Envoy) Present cross-hub chits to convene a guest-law summit.
(Emissary) Convene a cross-hub summit in the guest-law chamber.

(Offering) Spend a map sliver to align a mirror corridor into the Saltglass lanes.
(Escort) Surrender a windbone token for an updraft escort into the Cloud-Burrow.

(Cartographer) Trace the compass stem to thread a drop into the Saltglass caravans.
(Resonant) Sing the nexus chords into phase with the Cloud-Burrow chimes.

(Quiet Ledger 1+) File a ledger itinerary that drops you beside the Saltglass engines.

nexus_steward.title: Quiet Ledger Steward
nexus_steward.text: A Quiet Ledger scribe polishes bronze seed-tokens, charting balances owed for each route. They offer whispered summaries of distant starts.

choices.text: (Tides) Ask about the Moon-Eel Suburb's tides.
(Gales) Ask about the storm-rail moorings above the canyons.
(Survey) Thank the steward and study the compass again.
(Freehands 1+) Approve relief manifests and hitch a lift to their cache.
Loop the Root Assembly dispatches into Quiet Ledger circulation for good.

Take a restorative draught and rejoin the rows.
Deliver cooled balms to the sharecrop table.

starfallen_orchard_glass_lattice.title: Glass Lattice Loom
starfallen_orchard_glass_lattice.text: Glass threads stretch between meteor stakes, each strand shimmering with captured recollections. Apprentices etch glyphs into the lattice to guide future harvests.

choices.text: (Glasswright) Tune the capillaries so memories flow evenly.
(Cartographer) Weave a star-path into the lattice for future pickers.
Archive a gleaming story for the commons jars.
Follow cooling troughs back to the meteor cradle.

starfallen_orchard_story_graft.title: Story-Graft Arbor
starfallen_orchard_story_graft.text: A living arbor waits with a hollow branch, ready to accept a sliver of your true name. Orchard keepers steady the grafting knives, eyes bright with the promise of shared memory.

choices.text: Plant a graft bearing your true name and share its charge.
Trace the new graft's pulse and promise to return.
Step away before the branch can claim you.

starfallen_orchard_graft_recovery.title: Graft Recovery Alcove
starfallen_orchard_graft_recovery.text: Lanternfruit dim to a gentle glow as keepers bandage your new graft, weaving its pulse into yours. Cooling vapors and annotated ledgers surround a circle of resting orchardists.

choices.text: (Story-Graft) Spend your graft charge to borrow a memory about the commons steward.
(Cartographer) Compare your new graft lines with the grove's star-map.
(Healer) Check the graft for safe circulation.
Carry your renewed resolve to the commons.

starfallen_orchard_sharecrop_commons.title: Sharecrop Commons
starfallen_orchard_sharecrop_commons.text: A ring of tables laden with memory fruit forms the Sharecrop, each offering labeled for public use. Neighbors and travelers arrive in turn, ready to plant and borrow stories in trust.

choices.text: Contribute your gathered fruit to inaugurate the commons.
(Resonant) Lead a broadcast so every graft echoes the invitation.
(Cartographer) Plot rotation schedules to keep the commons balanced.
(Quiet Ledger 1+) Dedicate ledger grants to expand the sharecrop stores.
(Freehands 1+) Organize a gleaner network to share fruit with distant crews.
Slip away toward the saltglass expanse with new recollections.
Dedicate the memory harvest to the Orchard Accord infrastructure and oversee it.

ending_sharecrop_of_stories.title: The Sharecrop of Stories
ending_sharecrop_of_stories.text:
You publish the orchard's ledgers, turning every graft into a documented community promise.
Rotating crews tend the memory fruit, logging who watered, who harvested, and who shared.
Stories ripen into public resource rather than private archive.

ending_amnesty_of_names.title: Amnesty of Names
ending_amnesty_of_names.text:
Your amnesty charter ripples through the Startways, stamped by every ledger you petitioned.
Travelers line up to reclaim forgotten names or try on new ones without whispers trailing them.
Registrars now simply note the change and pass the quills along.

ending_unshattered_gale.title: Unshattered Gale
ending_unshattered_gale.text:
You stay to recalibrate each gust frame along the Cloud-Burrow warrens.
Wind-mole crews queue for your nod before launching, the updraft braided steady and low.
The cooperative posts your rota beside the tool hooks, marking you as the keeper of calm breezes.

ending_shade_treaty.title: Treaty of Moving Shade
ending_shade_treaty.text:
You settle the Treaty of Moving Shade beneath the caravan council's mirrored canopy.
Walking cities now align their shadows by shared schedule, cooling routes without tribute demanded.
Merchants wave the signed prisms, a treaty maintained by habit instead of heroics.

ending_living_wake.title: The Living Wake
ending_living_wake.text:
You turn the amber barges into a standing wake for anyone departing the docks.
Neighbors bring lanternbread and names to share, weaving every farewell into the tide.
By week's end the procession runs itself, held together by the quiet cues you leave behind.

ending_mooring_mediator.title: Mooring Mediator
ending_mooring_mediator.text:
You hang up your envoy sigils and take the Aeol rota seat above the moorings.
Each dawn you tune stormglass drums so incoming pilots stagger themselves instead of colliding.
When gusts snap cables, wardens call for the mediator, not the traveler you once were.

ending_market_steward.title: Market Steward Rotation
ending_market_steward.text:
You file the steward rota you drafted and stay to pilot the first market shift.
Petitioners cycle through benches you rebalanced, clerks rotating before tempers fray.
By evening the Root Assembly posts your schedule as standard practice.

ending_galleria_steward.title: Galleria Civic Cooperative
ending_galleria_steward.text:
You convert your maintenance map into a public roster for the Prism galleria lifts.
Vendors sign up for shared upkeep instead of bribed shortcuts, the rota chiming on open display.
Apprentices wave you toward the coordinator's desk you now occupy.

ending_freehands_regatta.title: Freehands Mist Regatta
ending_freehands_regatta.text:
You assemble the Freehands skiffs you cached in the grotto and lead them into the mist.
Run captains take your signals, ferrying migrants and cargo through lanes you just cleared.
By the next tide the regatta charter bears your notes for whoever captains tomorrow.

ending_cloud_cooperative.title: Cloud-Burrow Balcony Cooperative
ending_cloud_cooperative.text:
You stay behind on the Cloud-Burrow balconies to organize the coop glideway.
Families rotate watch on the tethered baskets, following the schedule you scribed on wind-proof slate.
The updraft mutters your guidelines every time a newcomer clips in.

ending_saltglass_wayfinder.title: Saltglass Wayfinder
ending_saltglass_wayfinder.text:
You lock your dune charts into the Saltglass co-op chest and claim the night shift.
Caravan captains queue for your mirrored signals, gliding through shade corridors without tribute.
The ledger lists you simply as Wayfinder on duty.

ending_shed_market_retirement.title: Shed Market Rotation Keeper
ending_shed_market_retirement.text:
You hang your final borrowed mask above the bazaar and settle into the rotation desk.
Molting patrons check in for husks and histories, trading favors you reconcile without fuss.
By closing bell the Quiet Ledger stamps you as permanent steward of the shed stalls.

ending_rainchain_hostel.title: Rainchain Hostel Steward
ending_rainchain_hostel.text:
You catalog bunk chits and hang fresh rainchain towels as ferries roll through.
Travelers swap tokens for dry hammocks under the steady rhythm you keep.
The hostel hums without fuss because you stay to mind the roster.

ending_root_night_auditor.title: Night Auditor of Roots
ending_root_night_auditor.text:
After hearings close you balance the petitions ledger by lanternlight.
Clerks slide you quiet nods while you reconcile favors into open access notes.
By dawn, the market trusts your calm sums more than any speech.

ending_prism_liftkeeper.title: Prism Liftkeeper
ending_prism_liftkeeper.text:
You take the night desk, tuning prism lifts to the cadence of working crews.
Vendors bring you coilbread while you pencil every shared ride onto the public slate.
The galleria lights stay even because you keep the rota honest.

ending_saltglass_waystation.title: Saltglass Waystation Warden
ending_saltglass_waystation.text:
You chalk mirrored arrows into the dune shelters and listen for caravan bells.
Night caravans coast in on your signals, trading gossip for cool shade.
The waystation ledger bears your initials beside every safe arrival.

ending_moon_eel_guest.title: Moon-Eel Guest Curator
ending_moon_eel_guest.text:
You settle in the ribcage hosthouse, annotating tide diaries between potluck shifts.
Residents drift through to borrow guest marks and leave baskets of brined sweets.
The suburb hums with gentle courtesy under your watch.

ending_wake_candle_warden.title: Wake Candle Warden
ending_wake_candle_warden.text:
You stand the middle watch of the wake barges, trimming wicks before each procession.
Mourners breathe easier knowing you log who needs a lantern and who can rest.
The river glows steady because you keep the candles in quiet rotation.

ending_bazaar_maskbinder.title: Maskbinder in Residence
ending_bazaar_maskbinder.text:
You hang each borrowed face back on its hook and record the stories tied to it.
Visitors leave new masks with consent slips you seal in lacquer.
The gallery becomes a calm exchange because you stay to tend every persona.

ending_cocoon_host_caretaker.title: Cocoon Hostel Caretaker
ending_cocoon_host_caretaker.text:
You make tea in the predawn hush and chart who wakes in which cocoon.
Travelers easing between selves find their blankets warmed and names spelled right.
The hostel keeps its gentle rhythm under your steady shift.

ending_freehands_dispatch.title: Freehands Dispatch Coordinator
ending_freehands_dispatch.text:
You claim a stool beside the cache ledger, logging every cord and salve that leaves.
Couriers swing by for your updated lists before sprinting into the dunes.
Relief routes stay supplied because you keep the dispatch drumbeat.

ending_canal_common_tide.title: Common Tide Charter
ending_canal_common_tide.text:
You draft a tide charter that stitches Aeol departure bells to Freehands relief runs.
Couriers now launch in alternating waves, sharing canals without jostled hulls.
The charter posts on both piers as a plain-signed schedule anyone can keep.

ending_shared_ledger_loop.title: Shared Ledger Loop
ending_shared_ledger_loop.text:
You merge Root Assembly dispatch notes with Quiet Ledger reimbursements.
Clerks swap tablets through your new loop, cross-crediting aid before disputes can bloom.
Routes stay funded because you normalized the cycle.

ending_balcony_safe_concord.title: Balcony Safety Concord
ending_balcony_safe_concord.text:
You publish a concord that pairs Aeol rosters with balcony stewards on every shift.
Couriers and residents clip the same safety charms before stepping onto windlines.
The burrow's glideways hum with mutual check-ins instead of flinches.

ending_prism_light_commons.title: Prism Light Commons
ending_prism_light_commons.text:
You unlock the prism lifts and post a commons pact linking them to guest-law routes.
Cartel stewards rotate upkeep with visiting advocates, their signatures all on one slate.
Lifts chime open to anyone carrying the new rota token.

ending_migrant_kithhouse.title: Migrant Kithhouse Accord
ending_migrant_kithhouse.text:
You circulate the kithhouse accord tying rest decks across the hubs to shared care.
Quiet Ledger stewards and Assembly hosts share pantry tallies on the same board.
Travelers find a ready bunk anywhere the accord seal hangs.

ending_orchard_accord.title: The Orchard Accord
ending_orchard_accord.text:
You braid the orchard's memory fruit harvest into a public conduit, the Orchard Accord.
Prism roots, tidal pumps, and Quiet Ledger grants now feed every hub's archive without gatekeepers.
Families queue beneath the meteor glass to draw shared memories like clean water.

ending_keeper_of_passways.title: Keeper of Passways
ending_keeper_of_passways.text:
You accept the steward's ledgers and move into the compass stem that threads every Startways arch.
Two factions' runners brief you each shift as you balance their requests against the tide of travelers.
Routes now whisper of the Keeper of Passways, a post anyone might inherit if they match your quiet balance.

singing_depths_entry.title: The Singing Depths Entry Chamber
singing_depths_entry.text:
You descend through shafts of crystalline light into a vast natural amphitheater where the very stones seem to breathe with ancient music. The air shimmers with harmonics that make your bones resonate—this place has been singing for millennia, waiting for someone to understand its song.

Bioluminescent moss traces intricate patterns across the walls, pulsing brighter whenever the deep harmonies crescendo from the depths below. You sense this is more than mere cave decoration—the moss responds to the crystal formations like a living musical score.

choices.text: (Deep-Listener) 'I can hear the song calling to me...' — Attune to the cavern's ancient resonance.
'The moss pattern... it's showing me the way.' — Follow the living light deeper underground.
(Healer) 'These frequencies... they're healing the stone itself.' — Study the therapeutic harmonics.
'These symbols... they're not carved. They're grown.' — Examine the living crystal script.
'I'm not ready for this place yet.' — Return to prepare for the depths.

singing_depths_resonance_chamber.title: Primary Resonance Chamber
singing_depths_resonance_chamber.text: A vast domed cavern where stalactites and stalagmites form a natural organ. Each formation vibrates with specific tones, creating complex harmonies that seem to carry meaning beyond mere sound.

choices.text: (Deep-Listener) Attempt to decode the harmonic message.
(Echo-Attuned) Harmonize with the chamber to amplify the resonance.
Study the acoustic properties for architectural insights.
Venture toward the sound of underground water.

singing_depths_moss_tunnels.title: Bioluminescent Moss Tunnels
singing_depths_moss_tunnels.text: Narrow passages wind through the rock, their walls carpeted with glowing moss that responds to sound with cascading waves of light. The air is thick with spores that tingle on your skin.

choices.text: (Healer) Collect moss samples for medicinal research.
Follow the brightest moss trail deeper underground.
(Scout) Map the tunnel network for future expeditions.
Create a light pattern to communicate with the moss.

singing_depths_healing_pools.title: Resonant Healing Pools
singing_depths_healing_pools.text: Natural pools filled with mineral-rich water vibrate with healing frequencies. Steam rises carrying medicinal vapors, and the pools' edges are lined with crystalline formations that amplify the therapeutic effects.

choices.text: (Healer) Establish a field hospital using the pools' properties.
Immerse yourself in the healing waters.
(Crystal-Shaper) Shape resonance crystals to contain the healing properties.
Study the water's mineral composition.

singing_depths_crystal_gardens.title: Living Crystal Gardens
singing_depths_crystal_gardens.text: Vast caverns where crystals grow like strange flowers, each one singing a unique note. The formations shift slowly, creating ever-changing melodies as they grow and interact with each other.

choices.text: (Crystal-Shaper) Guide the growth of new crystal formations.
Harvest singing crystal fragments for study.
(Deep-Listener) Record the crystal symphony for preservation.
Meditate among the singing crystals.

singing_depths_grand_cathedral.title: Grand Crystal Cathedral
singing_depths_grand_cathedral.text: The largest chamber in the depths, with crystal formations reaching hundreds of feet toward a natural dome. The acoustics here can amplify a whisper to be heard throughout the entire cavern system.

choices.text: (Deep-Listener) Conduct the Grand Symphony of the Depths.
Establish this as a meeting place for all underground dwellers.
Use the amplification to send messages to the surface.

root_assembly_testimonies_gathered.title: The Weight of Many Voices
root_assembly_testimonies_gathered.text:
After hours of careful listening, you've compiled a mosaic of fears, hopes, and conflicting interests. The elderly spice-seller worries her trade routes will shift with the seasons. Young clerks whisper about opportunities for advancement if the old systems change. Petitioners from distant islands carry urgent requests that could be stranded if coordination fails.

Your People-Reader abilities reveal the deeper truth: everyone knows change is coming, but no one trusts the others to change fairly. The Seasonal Compact isn't just about timing—it's about who gets to control the future.

'You've been listening well,' says a clerk, approaching with a knowing smile. 'Would you like to present these findings, or do you have other plans?'

choices.text: 'I need to present this to the Assembly. The people's voices must be heard.'
'These testimonies reveal a deeper crisis. I need to investigate the root cause.'
'The real power brokers aren't here. I need to find the ones making the actual decisions.'
'Each faction needs to hear what the others are really thinking.' — Become a mediator.

singing_depths_first_communion.title: The First Communion
singing_depths_first_communion.text:
As you open your mind to the depths' ancient song, the crystalline formations around you pulse with recognition. The music isn't random—it's a conversation that has waited centuries for someone who could hear both sides.

"Welcome, Echo-Attuned," whispers a voice like wind through crystal chimes. "We are the last guardians of the Deep Resonance, and our time grows short. The surface world's discord threatens to shatter what we protect here."

You realize you're not just exploring a cave—you've stumbled into a crisis that could determine the fate of two worlds.

choices.text: 'Tell me what threatens this place. I want to help.'
'What exactly are you protecting down here?'
'I came seeking knowledge, not to choose sides in ancient conflicts.'

singing_depths_moss_revelation.title: The Living Network
singing_depths_moss_revelation.text:
Following the moss deeper into the caverns, you discover it's not just decoration—it's a living communication network connecting every crystal formation in the depths. The moss pulses with messages traveling at the speed of light, coordinating the great harmonic symphony that keeps this realm stable.

Sudenly, the moss flares brilliant red. Something is wrong. Deep in the network, you sense panic, discord... and approaching danger from the surface world.

choices.text: Touch the moss network to receive its urgent message.
Follow the strongest pulse to find the source of the disturbance.
Try to calm the moss network with gentle harmonics.

singing_depths_healing_discovery.title: The Resonant Healer
singing_depths_healing_discovery.text:
Your healer's instincts prove correct—the crystal formations aren't just making music, they're performing a continuous healing ritual on a massive scale. The entire cave system is one enormous medical symphony, maintaining the health of something vast and vital.

As you examine the patterns more closely, you realize with growing awe and horror that the depths are healing the world itself. Every discord in the surface lands, every war, every breaking of harmony—it all creates wounds that these crystals work tirelessly to mend.

But now you can hear it: the healing song is breaking down. There are too many wounds, arriving too fast.

choices.text: 'I need to learn this healing technique to help from the surface.'
'Show me the source of these wounds. I want to stop them at the root.'
'What would happen if the healing song stopped completely?'

singing_depths_ancient_language.title: The Script of Stone and Light
singing_depths_ancient_language.text:
The symbols you thought were carved into the crystal walls reveal themselves to be something far more remarkable—they're alive, growing and shifting like crystalline vines that write themselves. This is the written form of the Deep Resonance, a language that exists in three dimensions and grows through time.

As you watch, new words bloom across the walls: 'Surface-walker... you read the deep script... we have waited long... time grows short... will you carry our words above?'

You're witnessing the birth of a message that could change everything—if you can learn to read it fully.

choices.text: 'I'll learn your language. Teach me to read the deep script.'
'What message do you need me to carry to the surface?'
'I'll help, but first I need to understand what's really happening here.'

singing_depths_guardian_council.title: Council of the Deep
singing_depths_guardian_council.text:
You're led through passages of living crystal to a vast chamber where the last three Crystal Guardians maintain their eternal watch. Each appears as a fusion of humanoid form and crystalline growth—ancient beings who chose to become one with the depths to preserve them.

'Surface-dweller,' speaks the eldest, her voice like distant thunder, 'your world's conflicts create psychic wounds that poison the resonance. Wars, betrayals, broken trusts—they echo down to us and corrupt our healing songs. If we cannot cleanse them, both our worlds will fall to discord.'

'But you...' adds another guardian, 'you carry the echo of peace. You could be the bridge we need.'

choices.text: 'Make me a Guardian too. Let me join your eternal watch.'
'I'll work from the surface to heal the conflicts at their source.'
'Teach me to hear these wounds so I can guide others to heal them.'

crystalline_reaches_edge.title: Crystal Threshold
crystalline_reaches_edge.text: Standing stones of living crystal hum with power at the entrance to an ever-shifting maze. The formations grow visibly, creating new pathways while sealing others with melodic chimes.

choices.text: (Crystal-Shaper) Shape an opening through the crystal barrier.
(Scout) Find a natural passage between the formations.
Study the patterns of crystal growth.
Wait and watch for the crystals to naturally shift.
Return to the Startways Nexus.

crystalline_reaches_central_plaza.title: Plaza of Singing Stones
crystalline_reaches_central_plaza.text: A circular clearing where towering crystal spires resonate in harmony. The ground is inlaid with crystalline paths that pulse with different colored lights, each leading to different districts of the reaches.

choices.text: (Crystal-Shaper) Conduct the crystal symphony to reveal hidden paths.
Follow the blue crystal path to the memory vaults.
Follow the red crystal path to the forges.
Follow the green crystal path to the living gardens.
Follow the gold crystal path to the treasury.
Approach the central spire to speak with the Crystal Singers.

crystalline_reaches_memory_vaults.title: Crystal Memory Vaults
crystalline_reaches_memory_vaults.text: Vast chambers filled with memory crystals that store experiences, knowledge, and emotions. Each crystal glows with stored life moments, creating a library of living experiences.

choices.text: (Crystal-Shaper) Shape a new memory crystal to store your experiences.
Study the ancient memory crystals for historical knowledge.
(Memory-Keeper) Organize and catalog the memory crystals.
Touch a crystal to experience a stored memory.

crystalline_reaches_crystal_forges.title: Living Crystal Forges
crystalline_reaches_crystal_forges.text: Workshops where Crystal Singers shape raw crystal into tools, weapons, and artifacts. The forges themselves are living crystals that respond to the crafter's intent and emotion.

choices.text: (Crystal-Shaper) Learn advanced crystal shaping techniques.
(Tinkerer) Design crystal-powered mechanisms.
Forge a crystal tool for your journey.
Study the singing properties of shaped crystals.

crystalline_reaches_living_gardens.title: Gardens of Growing Light
crystalline_reaches_living_gardens.text: Crystalline trees and plants that photosynthesize light itself, creating a garden where crystal flowers bloom with captured starlight and crystal fruits store pure illumination.

choices.text: (Crystal-Shaper) Encourage new crystal plant growth.
Harvest light fruit for sustenance.
(Light-Bender) Focus sunlight to accelerate crystal plant growth.
Rest in the peaceful glow of the crystal gardens.

singing_depths_heart_revelation.title: The Deep Truth
singing_depths_heart_revelation.text:
The ancient Guardian's eyes shimmer with crystal tears as she reveals the truth: 'This realm exists to heal the wounds that surface conflicts tear in the world's harmony. Every war above sends tremors through the foundations of reality. We sing the healing songs to prevent complete collapse.'

She gestures toward the living walls. 'But the damage is accelerating faster than we can repair it. The surface world may not survive another generation of such discord unless something changes.'

The weight of this revelation settles on your shoulders like a mantle of responsibility.

choices.text: 'I understand now. What can I do from the surface to help?'
'Then I'll stay and learn to be a Guardian myself.'
'There must be another way—one that doesn't require such sacrifice.'

singing_depths_surface_mission.title: Messenger of Harmony
singing_depths_surface_mission.text:
The Guardian nods gravely. 'You would carry our song to the surface, becoming a bridge between worlds. It is a path few can walk—you must learn to speak peace while conflict rages around you.'

She places a resonant crystal in your palm. 'This will help you remember the deep harmonies when surface cacophony threatens to drown them out. But know this: once you become a peacemaker, you can never again take sides in war.'

The crystal hums softly against your skin, already changing how you perceive the world.

choices.text: Accept this sacred responsibility and prepare to return to the surface.
'I need more time to understand what this truly means.'

singing_depths_empathy_training.title: Learning to Listen
singing_depths_empathy_training.text:
The Guardian leads you to a chamber where the walls pulse with the emotions of surface dwellers. You feel the fear of farmers during raids, the desperate courage of soldiers, the grief of those who've lost loved ones to conflict.

'Every surface emotion echoes here,' she explains as you struggle not to be overwhelmed. 'To heal, you must first understand the depth of the wounds. Touch the wall and let yourself feel their pain—only then can you learn to transmute it.'

The experience is intense, but gradually you begin to distinguish between the different emotional currents.

choices.text: Embrace the full depth of surface suffering to truly understand.
Focus on the healing techniques rather than the pain itself.
'This is too much. I can't carry all this suffering.'
Use your newfound empathy to return to the surface world.
Return to the surface world with your new understanding.

singing_depths_wound_source.title: The Source of All Wounds
singing_depths_wound_source.text:
As you open yourself fully to the pain flowing from the surface, you begin to see the underlying patterns. Most conflicts aren't born from genuine disagreement—they stem from fear, misunderstanding, and the inability to truly hear one another.

A vision forms in the crystal walls: you see how a simple trade dispute escalated into warfare because neither side could bridge the gap between their different ways of communicating. The real enemies are not the people themselves, but the barriers that prevent authentic connection.

'Now you see,' the Guardian whispers. 'The healing begins not with stopping the fighting, but with teaching people how to truly listen.'

choices.text: 'Teach me how to break down those barriers of communication.'
'I want to learn the healing songs that can bridge any divide.'
Return to the surface immediately with this knowledge.

singing_depths_language_lessons.title: The Universal Language
singing_depths_language_lessons.text:
The Guardian teaches you the deep script—not just the written symbols, but the emotional harmonics that underlie all communication. You learn that every language carries the fears and hopes of its speakers, and that true understanding requires hearing not just words, but the feelings beneath them.

'When surface dwellers cannot understand each other, it's often because they're speaking from different emotional states,' she explains as glowing symbols dance in the air around you. 'Fear speaks one language, hope another. Learn to translate between these emotional dialects, and you can bridge any divide.'

The knowledge settles into your mind like a new sense awakening.

choices.text: Master this art and become a professional mediator.
Learn to record and preserve these communication techniques.
Prepare to teach others this universal language.

singing_depths_healing_training.title: Songs of Restoration
singing_depths_healing_training.text:
The healing songs are more complex than you imagined—they're not just melodies, but entire symphonies of emotional restoration. You learn how specific harmonic patterns can dissolve anger, how rhythm can rebuild trust, and how silence itself can create space for understanding.

The Guardian demonstrates by singing to a withered crystal formation. Under her song, it begins to bloom with renewed light, its fractures healing and its surface becoming smooth again. 'Emotional wounds follow similar patterns,' she explains. 'But the healing must come from within—the song merely provides the conditions for natural restoration.'

Your voice begins to carry new harmonic qualities as the training progresses.

choices.text: Focus on learning to heal traumatic memories.
Learn to create healing environments for groups.
Study the theoretical foundations behind the healing songs.

singing_depths_crystal_workshop.title: Resonance Forge
singing_depths_crystal_workshop.text:
Within this workshop, crystal formations grow under guided harmonies. The Guardian shows you how to shape living crystal with song, creating instruments that can store and amplify healing vibrations. The work requires both technical precision and deep emotional attunement.

'Each crystal remembers the song that shaped it,' she explains as you watch her coax a new formation from raw crystal seed. 'Shape them with healing intent, and they become tools for restoration. Shape them with malice, and they become weapons. The crystal merely amplifies what the shaper truly feels.'

The implications are both inspiring and sobering.

choices.text: Create healing crystals to take to the surface.
Learn to grow crystal instruments for teaching harmony.
Study the dangerous applications to understand their prevention.

singing_depths_apocalypse_vision.title: When the Music Stops
singing_depths_apocalypse_vision.text:
The Guardian reluctantly shows you the vision she most fears—what would happen if the healing songs fell silent. Crystal formations throughout the chamber show scenes of devastation: surface wars spiraling beyond all control, reality itself beginning to fracture under the weight of unhealed wounds, landscapes twisted by the emotional violence of eternal conflict.

'This is why we cannot simply withdraw our protection,' she says as the visions fade. 'But maintaining the songs forever is also unsustainable—we need surface dwellers to learn harmony themselves, or this realm will eventually exhaust itself trying to heal wounds that are constantly reopened.'

The urgency of finding a better solution becomes clear.

choices.text: 'Then I'll dedicate my life to teaching surface harmony.'
'There must be a way to make the healing self-sustaining.'
'What if we could teach the songs to representatives from every faction?'

crystalline_reaches_hidden_grove.title: Secret Crystal Garden
crystalline_reaches_hidden_grove.text:
Your scouting skills reveal a passage between two massive crystal formations, leading to a hidden grove where wild crystals grow in their natural state. Unlike the cultivated formations elsewhere, these crystals pulse with uncontrolled power, their songs discordant yet hauntingly beautiful.

Among the wild growths, you discover the remains of an ancient crystal-shaper's workshop. Tools of impossible delicacy lie scattered among formations that defy conventional understanding. Clearly, someone once experimented with techniques far beyond current knowledge.

choices.text: Study the ancient tools to learn lost techniques.
Attempt to harmonize with the wild crystal songs.
Carefully harvest some of the wild crystal for research.
Map this location for future expeditions.

crystalline_reaches_harmonic_chambers.title: The Crystal Symphony
crystalline_reaches_harmonic_chambers.text:
As you begin conducting the harmonies within the crystal formations, their individual songs begin to synchronize. The entire grove transforms into a massive musical instrument, with each crystal formation contributing its voice to an ever-growing symphony.

The music reveals hidden pathways between the formations and causes new crystals to emerge from the ground. You realize you've awakened something ancient—a living composition that has been waiting centuries for someone with the skill to conduct it properly.

The symphony builds to a crescendo that opens a passage deeper into the crystal maze.

choices.text: Follow the newly opened passage to its destination.
Try to record the complete symphony for preservation.
Use the awakened formations to create a teaching facility.

crystalline_reaches_master_archive.title: Heart of Crystal Memory
crystalline_reaches_master_archive.text:
The passage leads to a vast chamber where thousands of memory crystals float in perfect formation, each one containing the experiences and knowledge of ancient crystal-shapers. As you approach, they begin to resonate in response to your presence, offering to share their accumulated wisdom.

You realize this is the true treasure of the Crystalline Reaches—not just the crystals themselves, but the living library of everyone who ever mastered their secrets. The crystals seem eager to find a new keeper worthy of preserving their knowledge for future generations.

choices.text: Accept the role of Archive Keeper and dedicate your life to this knowledge.
Learn what you can and return to share it with others.
Search for knowledge about crystal healing techniques.

underground_canal_junction.title: Underground Canal Junction
underground_canal_junction.text:
The glowing canal opens into a junction where several waterways converge. Ancient carved symbols mark passages leading in different directions, while bioluminescent organisms provide gentle illumination throughout the network.

This seems to be a major transit hub for the underground systems, with currents flowing toward different parts of the archipelago.

choices.text: Follow the canal toward the Root Assembly territories.
Take the passage that leads toward the surface docks.
Explore the passage marked with crystal symbols.
Return to the Luminous Grotto.

elevated_grotto_chamber.title: Elevated Grotto Chamber
elevated_grotto_chamber.text:
Climbing the phosphorescent roots brings you to a higher chamber with natural windows carved by centuries of water flow. From here, you can see the broader network of caverns and passages stretching throughout the underground.

The elevated position provides multiple routes forward, each leading toward different parts of the archipelago.

choices.text: Descend toward the singing caverns.
Follow the passage toward crystalline formations.
Take the upward path toward the surface.
Return to the lower grotto.

prism_workshop_level.title: Prism Workshop Level
prism_workshop_level.text:
The maintenance stairs lead to a working level where crystal artisans shape prisms and mirrors. The workshops hum with activity as light is bent, focused, and redirected through an intricate network of optical devices.

Several passages lead from here to different parts of the Cartel's operations and beyond.

choices.text: Visit the main Cartel administrative offices.
Follow the light conduits toward the central nexus.
Take the service tunnel toward the Root Assembly areas.
Return to the main galleria below.

prism_administrative_hub.title: Prism Cartel Administrative Hub
prism_administrative_hub.text:
The administrative center of Prism Cartel operations buzzes with clerks managing trade routes, light allocations, and mirror networks. Maps of the entire archipelago cover the walls, showing the complex web of optical communications that keep the islands connected.

From this central hub, you can access many different regions of the archipelago.

choices.text: Request transport to the central Startways Nexus.
Join a caravan heading toward the Root Assembly territories.
Take passage on a light-ship to the cloud territories.
Return to the workshop level.

orchard_exit_gateway.title: Meteor Trail Gateway
orchard_exit_gateway.text:
Ancient meteor trails carved through the orchard create natural pathways leading back toward the main archipelago. The trails pulse with residual cosmic energy, providing clear navigation routes away from the memory groves.

From here, multiple paths diverge toward different regions of the islands.

choices.text: Follow the bright trail toward the Saltglass Expanse.
Take the elevated path toward the Startways Nexus.
Return to explore more of the orchard.

amber_tides_harbor_exit.title: Tidal Harbor Gateway
amber_tides_harbor_exit.text:
The harbor opens to broader channels that flow between the memorial islands and the main archipelago. Tidal currents carry vessels toward different regions, while floating walkways provide passage for those who prefer to stay dry.

Navigation charts mark multiple routes to major population centers.

choices.text: Ride the tidal current toward the central nexus.
Follow the floating walkways toward the cloud territories.
Return to the memorial harbors.

shed_market_exit_plaza.title: Market District Exit Plaza
shed_market_exit_plaza.text:
At the edge of the Shed Skins district, a transit plaza provides connections to the broader archipelago. Identity verification stations ensure travelers can carry their chosen personas beyond the market boundaries.

Transport options connect to major hubs throughout the islands.

choices.text: Board transport to the Startways Nexus.
Take the route toward the Root Assembly territories.
Return to the market district.
